item.title: Supply Chain Latest: US-China Relations Stay Distant Despite Talks
item.description: US-China Relations Remain Distant Despite Talks on Supply Chains The United States and China held high-level talks on supply chain issues on June 3, but the two sides remain divided on a number of issues, including technology transfer and intellectual property rights.
